name: CaveCore
description:
A unknown energy source has been discovered!

The organization known as WorldCure has discovered an unknown energy source coming from Island Netal, they've tried to send over robots to investigate however they have too become lost...

Due to this they hired Lilly a young scientist and with the assistance of the highly advanced machine Drilly they go of the explore Island Netal.

This is where you come in!

You as the player will control Lilly and help her explore the underground caves whilst exploring this 2D autorunner underground  adventure what will the mystery of Island Netal uncover?

Features
  • 4 levels full of underground platforming action
  • A narrative to get to know the cast better
  • A level select to try out any of the main levels you like!
  • A cool manual that comes with downloading this game :)
Will you explore Island Netal?

What could be the mysterious energy source of Island Netal?

Only one way to find out!

Hello thank you for reading, this project was completed in over 3 months as its a part of an assignment for my course, It is my very second game I made using Unity and I decided that its worthy of making it public so here it is!

Currently there are no plans to update or expand upon this game in the future but I would still greatly appreciate the feedback for future projects!
